name: Web Music
author: Ignacio Cuppi

sections.description:
Music Web is a plugin for WordPress that lets you insert music players or recordings in your blog post. This makes it easy to add music to the post in your blog, and podcast for personal recordings.
Platform that supports:

  • Goear
  • Ijigg
  • Evoca
  • MyBloop
  • Deezer
  • Spool.fm

How to use:

Put the url between the tags [mus] and [/ mus]

[mus]http://www.goear.com/listen/9676ce6/Boulevard-of-Broken-Dreams-Green-Day[/mus]
[mus]http://www.ijigg.com/songs/V2ABEE4PB0[/mus]
[mus]http://www.evoca.com/everyone_recording.jsp?rid=11154[/mus]
[mus]http://mybloop.com/go/J91e16[/mus]
[mus]http://www.deezer.com/track/1277819[/mus]
[mus]http://spool.fm/#track/LTCr2ZWy/Britney+Spears/Gimme+More[/mus]

In Spanish:

Web Music es un plugin para WordPress que te permite insertar reproductores de música o grabaciones en los post de tu blog. Con esto se facilita la tarea de agregar música a los post de tu blog, y también grabaciones personales para realizar podcast.

Plataformas que soporta:

  • Goear
  • Ijigg
  • Evoca
  • MyBloop
  • Deezer
  • Spool.fm

Modo de Uso:

Poner la url entre las etiquetas [mus] y [/mus]

[mus]http://www.goear.com/listen/9676ce6/Boulevard-of-Broken-Dreams-Green-Day[/mus]
[mus]http://www.ijigg.com/songs/V2ABEE4PB0[/mus]
[mus]http://www.evoca.com/everyone_recording.jsp?rid=11154[/mus]
[mus]http://mybloop.com/go/J91e16[/mus]
[mus]http://www.deezer.com/track/1277819[/mus]
[mus]http://spool.fm/#track/LTCr2ZWy/Britney+Spears/Gimme+More[/mus]
sections.installation:
1. Upload web-music directory in the wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Add music and recordings to your post!

In Spanish:

  1. Subir el directorio web-music en el directorio wp-content/plugins
  2. Activar el plugin
  3. Añade música y grabaciones a tus post!
